tns:patch.keyword: Prevent Computation = Yes workspaces to be saved without filter or children organizations
tns:patch.author: apicca
tns:patch.description: fix all existing workspaces which are computation = Yes and don't have defined filters or children organizations

script.lang: update amp_team set computation = false where amp_team.amp_team_id in ( select amp_team_id from amp_team a where computation = true and not exists (select 1 from amp_team_filter_data atfd where atfd.amp_team_id = a.amp_team_id) and not exists (select 1 from amp_team_orgs ato where ato.amp_team_id = a.amp_team_id) )
